message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11500.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find it elsewhere within my budget. I would like to counteroffer at $10000.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I have to consider my own costs and the value I've already offered. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $11000.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counteroffer at $10500.
I'm glad we're still in negotiation, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm counteroffering at $11250.
I see, Alice. Thank you for your continued willingness to negotiate. I would like to counteroffer at $11000.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $11200, but that's as low as I can go.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to meet me halfway. I would like to counteroffer at $11000.

I've already offered you a price at $11200, and you've countered at $11000. I'm not willing to go any lower than $11200. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.
